transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji, baat kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Haan bolo ji.
Executive: Umar sir, very good afternoon sir, good evening, kaise ho aap?
Customer: Nahi aap kaun malum nahi ho.
Executive: Ji sir?
Customer: Kaun aap malum nahi ho?
Executive: Are you comfortable in English sir? Can we talk in English?
Customer: Hindi, Hindi, Hindi.
Executive: Hindi mein baat kar sakte hain. Main keh raha hu aap Umar sahab baat kar rahe hain na?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Umar sahab, mera naam Prashant hai. Main IndiaMART office se baat kar raha hu, senior manager.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji, main aapki services ke regarding discuss karna chahta tha. Kya hua sir, kuch dikkat pareshani aa rahi hai kya?
Customer: Time time ho gaya tumhara, hamara office ka time 6 baje band ho jata.
Executive: Office 6 baje band ho jata hai, abhi do minute pehle to aapne IndiaMART customer care number pe call kiya tha.
Customer: Nahi ye wohi hai, ye tum aadha aadha ghanta lete baat karne ke liye.
Executive: Nahi, main ye keh raha hu, abhi 5 minute pehle, 5 minute bhi nahi hua, 2 minute pehle aapne IndiaMART customer care number pe call kiya tha na sir?
Customer: Haan, sahi kiya tha, haan.
Executive: Haan, to kuch pareshani aa rahi hai, usko discussion ke liye call kiya tha na? To usi ke liye to maine call kiya, ek baar baat to lete hain please.
Customer: Nahi woh jo main dala hu, main abhi factory wala hu, woh factory wale ka mujhe add aa raha hai usme. Order jata hai. Kiska add aa raha hai?
Customer: Main hamara jo factory hai. Woh woh mujhe bhi factory wale kuch ye dalte. Customer ka nahi dalte, koi pucha karke.
Executive: Achcha. To aapke paas jo requirement aa rahi hai, woh unhi log ki aa rahi hai jo khud bhi ek supplier hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Matlab woh khud ek businessman hai, kharidne wale grahak nahi hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha. Achcha mujhe ek baat batayenge sir, IndiaMART pe jo profile chal raha hai, uski service aap dekhte hain ya fir kisi aur ko de rakha hai aapne handle karne ke liye?
Customer: Nahi nahi hum hi dekhte hain, lekin kya kare usme pure factory walon ka aa raha hai to kuch dikh raha nahi hai. Woh bhi factory wale hain.
Executive: Haan bilkul, woh factory wale hain agar unse baat hogi to woh bhi bech rahe hain, aap bhi bech rahe ho. To fir woh kaise hoga? Aapka kuch location ka preferences hai kya ki aap kuch location pe deal kar sakte hain?
Customer: Location kya hai, pura barabar hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi puch raha hu. Main puch raha hu ki aap pure India mein deal karenge ya Karnataka mein hi deal karenge?
Customer: Karnataka mein karke hamara agreement baat chit hua tha.
Executive: Aur aapne kafi sare product delete maar diye hain jaise blackboard chalk. Black colour chalk.
Customer: Nahi woh woh sabhi ek hi category hai abhi aapka promotion ho raha hai.
Executive: Unki company ka ho?
Customer: Main puch raha hu sir ki abhi dustless chalk, keval ek hi category mein promotion ho raha hai, baki to sir aapne kai sare product jaise blackboard wagera out of stock mark kar diya na?
Customer: Thodo sabhi nahi bechte ji hum. Blackboard hai, pencil hai. Achcha. Hum khali chalk piece manufacture karte hain.
Executive: Achcha multi colour chalk bhi to deal karte hain na sir aap?
Customer: Sabhi sabhi karte hain.
Executive: Multi colour chalk bhi deal karte hain aap, achchi baat hai. Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Isko main sahi karwa raha hu. Iske alawa chalk ke alawa koi product hai aapke paas?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi.
Executive: Chalk ke alawa koi bhi product nahi hua?
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Achcha. Aur keval Karnataka ke deal chahiye, Karnataka se?
Customer: Haan ki to nearest hua to ye kya bada item nahi hota, ye 10 rupay ka item hai. Ye bada 100 200 ka item nahi hota, ye 10 rupay ka haan chota small scale industries hota. Kareeb mein.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Bechte dete, transport jyada hota. Koi bhi leta nahi. Tut jata, tut jata. Koi bhi leta nahi, tut jata hai. Haan. Haan.
Executive: Nahi do teen mahine mein tumhare paas ek kara ke ek customer dene.
Customer: Do teen mahina ho gaya aapko customer.
Executive: Theek hai lo kal karta hu, okay. Ji sir. Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai kal kal karta hu. Baat karte hain. Baat karte hain sir aapke, theek hai.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Hello, hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Getting factory owner leads instead of customers.

- Wants leads only from Karnataka.

- Products marked out of stock.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to correct the issue.

- Executive confirmed about multi-color chalk dealing.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, products, promotion
